PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-17282005-10-04,  PSEP,  ,  , 
ActEmergency Preparedness Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCIES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 82 - which declares the severe flooding, landslides and ice jams on most major rivers that affected the North East, Central South West, South East and Vancouver Island regions of BRITISH COLUMBIA from January 17 to 31, 2005, to be of concern to the federal government, and authorizes the provision of financial assistance in respect thereof.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
